Tears of Selûne.name: Tears of Selûne
Tears of Selûne.flavor: You conjure a small orb of luminescent silver light that streaks to your enemy. Its power is unpredictable, but so are the moods of the moon.
Tears of Selûne.attack: Intelligence vs. Will, Wisdom vs. Will, or Charisma vs. Will
Tears of Selûne.onHit: While you are bloodied, deal 3d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier psychic damage. If you are not bloodied, the target is instead stunned until the start of its next turn.

Moonglow.name: Moonglow
Moonglow.flavor: Where you walk in the power of your goddess, darkness yields to silvery splendor.
Moonglow.effect: Until the end of the encounter, darkness within 6 squares of you counts as dim light.

Moonfire.name: Moonfire
Moonfire.flavor: From overhead a spiraling column of cold, white light descends against your foe. Even as it consumes the wicked, your allies are soothed by its cool glow.
Moonfire.attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex, Wisdom vs. Reflex, or Charisma vs. Reflex
Moonfire.onHit: 4d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier radiant damage, and all allies within 5 squares of the target regain hit points equal to one-half your level + your Charisma modifier.
Moonfire.onMiss: Half damage, and all bloodied enemies within 5 squares of the target take radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
